|brand = Sophos |model = AP15 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Rev. 1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 16 November 2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Sophos_AP_15 |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2ACTO-AP15 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 1244-01000933-50Z |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9557; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 720 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12835FMI-10G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1A:8C |oui = 00:1A:8C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_poe_type = af/at |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = external antennas |addchip = 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;2;,,, 150V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4848DY;;1;,,, 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;Texas Instruments;TPS23754;;1;,,, 23V 3A Synchronous Rectified Step-Down DC/DC Converter;M3Tek;IT76370M;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2020 |fccapprovdate = 09/03/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 22Z-000Y-00057 |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1244-01000933-50Z" and "BP ML E186014" are silkscreened on the board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Qualcomm Atheros]]'' QCA9557 [[MIPS 74K]] (@720MHz) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 16MB SPI NOR Flash *WiFi: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9557 (802.11bgn) *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet ports *Power: 12V, 1A via barrel or 802.3af/at PoE
==Links of Interest== [https://www.sophos.com/es-es/medialibrary/PDFs/factsheets/OEM-solutions/sophos-wireless-access-points-dsna.pdf Datasheet]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/sophos/sophos_ap15 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ath79 |subtarget = generic |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.2 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
